title: Something Important
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Not here either… Ugh, where could it be!? This is really weird, I could’ve sworn it was right here…<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Nico, practice already started… Huh!? W-what’s going on in here!? This room looks like a disaster!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Ah, Umi. My bad, I’ll clean this up later.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Why did you make such a mess?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I was looking for something.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Oh, I see. I’ll help you out. Could you tell me what it is you’re looking for?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Huh!? N-no, thanks, I’ll be fine. It’s not that important...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Judging by the mess you’ve made on the shelf there, I wouldn’t say this is “not that important”.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I guess...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Maki and I were organizing the shelf the other day, so... huh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>What?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Oh, it’s nothing... I have no idea what it is you’re looking for, but something tells me it’s in the box on the bottom right.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I-I’ll be heading off to the roof now, come as soon as you find it, okay? Bye!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
